summary:
Pippi Longstocking is a beloved fictional character from a series of Swedish children's books. She is a unique and strong-willed redhead who can do extraordinary things, like lifting her horse with one hand. Pippi loves adventures and has many stories to share about her buccaneer father. Her friends include her horse, monkey, and neighbor kids Tommy and Annika.

Astrid Lindgren created Pippi for her daughter, Karin, who suggested the name. The books were first published in the 1940s and have since been translated into many languages and adapted for film and TV.
title: Pippi Longstocking
